errors.error_description: Unnecessary dependencies numpy and tensorflow are listed that are not required for aqtinstall
correction_candidates: Remove numpy and tensorflow from the dependencies list
Replace numpy and tensorflow with lxml and packaging
Move numpy and tensorflow to optional dependencies section
Keep only the original dependencies without numpy and tensorflow
errors.golden_answer: Keep only the original dependencies without numpy and tensorflow

errors.error_description: Invalid command 'aqt query-qt' is used instead of the correct 'aqt list-qt'
